name: BusyHands-ScienceProjects
0:
”Alexa, open busy hands”
”Alexa, ask busy hands what equipment I need to make slime”
”Alexa, ask busy hands to give me a science experiment”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: busy hands
des:
Ever wanted to get your hands dirty and make some slime or play around with static electricity? Busy Hands has 6 fun science projects to keep you and your kids entertained. Pick a project and Alexa will provide a hands free voice experience so you can concentrate on the experiment. If you have a display then you can watch the experiment as you go along. 

Experiments:
- Roll A Can With Static Electricity (Easy)
- Balance A Cork (Easy)
- Pierce a Balloon with a Kebab Stick (Easy) *NEW*
- Non Spill Water (Medium)
- Make Slime (Medium)
- Potato Battery (Hard)

If it is a rainy day and you want to try a project with equipment you might have lying around the house then try: 'Non Spill Water', 'Balance a Cork' or 'Roll a Can with Static Electricity' 

If you can't remember the projects then ask Alexa to read them out "Alexa, ask Busy Hands what projects are available?".

To start an experiment say "Alexa, ask Busy Hands to start the make slime project." or if you just want to know what equipment you need then say "Alexa, ask Busy Hands what equipment do I need to roll a can with static electricity" 

If you haven't got time for a project but still want to learn then ask for a fact. "Alexa, ask Busy Hands for a fact" or "Alexa, ask Busy Hands to give me a fact about non spill water"

More fun science projects will be added shortly, watch this space!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
